name: Asteroid Mayhem (Narukoopa)
description:
Victory At All Costs

Asteroid Mayhem is a third-person, multiplayer action game that takes place on a wandering asteroid flying through the cosmos. You pilot a ship and engage in battle, both on the ground and in the air, as you fight for supremacy. 

Utilising a unique blend of deathmatch and king of the hill, Asteroid Mayhem gives players the choice to pursue the objective they wish to follow.  Defeat 10 opponents, or stick with the moving control point for as long as possible. How you play is up to you.

An Ever-Changing Battlefront

Use the full fire power of your ship's arsenal to defeat your enemies. Fire rockets, place mines or activate your shields to deflect incoming hostilities. Should the situation get too hot, activate your jetpack and fly away to safety. 

Final Notes:

If you cannot connect to the lobby in the web version of the game, you will have to download the zipped project folder. 

Extract the folder to any location you choose and double click the 'Racing Game' exe file to play.

This is a multiplayer-only game. Users will need to create a room and share the name of it with other people in order to play together.
